# Terms of Service for Consum

**Effective Date:** December 2, 2025

Welcome to Consum (https://consum.app). By using our website and services, you agree to comply with the following terms.

---

### **1. Overview**

Consum is an AI-powered tool that transforms self-improvement content into actionable habit blueprints. Users can sign up for a free plan with limited features, or subscribe to a paid plan for full access. You must be at least 16 years old to use Consum.

**AI Disclaimer:** Habit blueprints are generated by AI for informational purposes only. We do not guarantee accuracy or suitability. You are solely responsible for evaluating and implementing any advice. Consum is not liable for harm resulting from following AI-generated guidance.

---

### **2. Accounts**

To use Consum, you must provide accurate information, including your email and payment information (for paid plans). By subscribing, you agree to pay any applicable fees. You are responsible for maintaining account security.

---

### **3. Free & Paid Plans**

New users can access limited features on the free plan. Paid subscriptions unlock additional features and higher usage limits. You can cancel anytime. We may modify plan features or pricing with 30 days' notice via email.

---

### **4. Data Collection**

We collect personal data including email addresses and usage data to provide our services and improve user experience. We use Google Gemini AI to process your content. We do not sell your data to third parties. For more details, please refer to our [Privacy Policy](https://consum.app/privacy).

---

### **5. User Content & GDPR Compliance**

**Your Content:** You retain ownership of your input (goals, habits, text, YouTube links). You grant us a license to process it via AI. You represent that you have rights to any content you submit and that it complies with applicable laws.

**GDPR Compliance:** Consum complies with GDPR. For details on your data rights, see our [Privacy Policy](https://consum.app/privacy).

**Acceptable Use:** You may not use Consum for illegal purposes, abuse our systems, or generate harmful content. We may suspend or terminate accounts for violations.

---

### **6. Updates to Terms**

We may update these terms from time to time. You will be notified of any changes via email.

---

### **7. Governing Law & Liability**

These Terms are governed by the laws of Poland.

**Limitation of Liability:** To the maximum extent permitted by law, our total liability shall not exceed the greater of â‚¬50 or the amount you paid in the last 12 months. We are not liable for AI output errors, service interruptions, data loss, or third-party actions.
